data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Dhenkanal, Odisha, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dhenkanal, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help 238 new simple churches start among the 1,192,800 people in the county of Dhenkanal, Odisha, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Dhenkanal, Odisha, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Dhenkanal, Odisha, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Devangri people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Dhenkanal access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,192,800 souls in Dhenkanal and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dhenkanal, Odisha, India has a population of 1,192,800.

We estimate Dhenkanal has 13,121 people who might know Jesus, 14,473 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,165,207 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Dhenkanal.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Dhenkanal
location.people_groups_list: Naliya (Hindu traditions), Sidhria, Gammalla, Bhandari, Cherua
